ygData.subject: Re: My 2 coppers on Smithing...
ygData.msgSnippet: All I have to say is PLAY THE LOTTO silvermyst
ygData.messageBody:
All I have to say is PLAY THE LOTTO
silvermyst

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Brian Plexico [SMTP:plex@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 10:01 AM
> To: 'EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com'
> Subject: [EQ_SMITHS] Re: My 2 coppers on Smithing...
>
> From: Brian Plexico <plex@...>
>
> What you did was like rolling two Zero's on 2 ten sided dice!
> Zarluak
>
> On Tue, 4 May 1999, VAN DEN CRUYCE JOHN wrote:
>
> > From: VAN DEN CRUYCE JOHN <john.vandencruyce@...>
> >
> > I consider myself a rather strange Smith. I took up Smithing when I was
> a
> > lvl7 Barbarian Warrior. At that time, I put 19 practice points in it,
> and
> > that was it. I started sharpening things, and quickly became lvl20.
> After
> > that, I made a few metal bits, and became lvl21. A few files and skewers
> > later, I became lvl24, and then I tried my first Banded Helm. It worked.
> You
> > can imagine how surprised I was when I read that I shouldn't start with
> > banded until I got to lvl70-80. I have now become a lvl9 Warrior, and
> have
> > 10 more practice points to waste. I tried to dump them into Smithing as
> > well, but my trainer refused to teach me any further. I wonder why...
> > anybody have a clue? Also... I am currently stationed in Rivervale, and
> I
> > wonder if they sell the components you need for smithing over there. I
> found
> > a forge, but that was all. (And I really don't feed like going to
> Freeport
> > again, way too many Griffins)
> > Tips for a beginning smith (it seems that is what I am) are most
> welcome.
> >
> > Regards,
> >
> > Gornar.
> >
> > ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> > Looking for a fun, easy way to stay in touch with family members?
> > http://www.onelist.com
> > Create a ONElist community just for your family!
> > ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> > The EQ BlackSmithy Discussion Group
> > List Administrator:
> > chade@...
> >
>
